overview:
Mark Glennon is Managing Director at Ninth Street Advisors. From 2001 to 2010, Mark sourced and managed venture capital investments for Leo Capital Holdings. Recent board of directorship service includes GrubHub, Inc., Shoutlet, Inc. and FunMobility, Inc. Earlier portfolio companies in which he was actively involved include StarNet Interactive, Inc, FastMobile, Inc. and Firefly Mobile, Inc. He is currently a member of Hyde Park Angels.

Mark is the recent winner of the Fellows Medal awarded by the Illinois Venture Capital Association for outstanding contributions to the venture capital and private equity profession. At that association, Mark now serves as Treasurer, member of the Executive Committee of the Board, member of the Political Action Committee, and Co-Chair of the Data Committee.
